item.title: Dumped vehicle, 19th December
item.description:
Car been parked/dumped for a week causing problems coming around the roundabout onto Poverest Road. Car has been hit by another vehicle and has not moved.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 253, Poverest Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Gully (drain pipe) on the balcony of my apartment block is blocked and does not drain any rain, 19th December
item.description:
The gully (drainpipe) for my house specifically is blocked and it does not drain when there is rain. As a result the balcony overflows. This is only a problem in the gully near my house and not the other houses in the apartment block.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Evering Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing manhole cocer, 19th December

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kedleston Drive, Poverest, Greater London

item.title: Street middle island tall bollard lamp not working, 19th December
item.description:
Just off a busy roundabout, and outside 49 Knatchbull Road SE5 9QR there is a crossing point with a tall bollard lamp on the island in the middle of the road as per the two photos which has not been working for weeks. This location is on the edge of Lambeth Council and Southwark Council and the problem is that each says it is the others responsibility. However I believe it is Southwark Council's responsibility. This is a very busy and dangerous crossing that needs the light and is a HEALTH & SAFETY risk that is urgent for safety reasons. Look forward to hearing further.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Calais Street, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Jenner road, 19th December
item.description:
The whole road is very sad with lots of fly tipping this is at the end of Jenner road just before the Brooke road junction

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Damaged tree causing potential danger to people below., 19th December
item.description:
Top branch of willow tree, located on island in pond, is hanging dangerously and could fall onto people below at any time. Too high up for volunteers to remove safely. Access to this spot is via concrete ramp at southern end of pond. Gate secured with a standard Parks padlock.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glassmill Lane, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Diverted Traffic sign, 19th December
item.description:
There is a large yellow "Diverted Traffic" sign on the pavement at the Cassland/Terrace rd junction. It has been there several months. This is the 7th time I have reported it. Can it be removed please?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Terrace Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Staying red for too long, 19th December
item.description:
No safety concerns, the lights are staying red too long and causing tail backs right back to Thames road and Perry Street roundabout. I am a resident in Wyatt road and is causing me a long time to pull out on the roundabout These are causing tailbacks in both directions. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Courier bag dumped, 19th December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hawthorne Crescent, Greenwich
